Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Specimen Container(s): Transport Media (BD/Copan UTM, Remel M4, Remel M4RT, Remel M5, Remel M6, Copan eSwab)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Solana RSV+hMPV Assay using RT-HDA on the Solana instrument to detect and differentiate RSV and hMPV viral RNA from respiratory swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for detection and differentiation of RSV and hMPV viral RNA in nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs from patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, to aid in differential diagnosis in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors
